name: Suspicious Word Cab File Write CVE-2021-40444
description: Detects file creation patterns noticeable during the exploitation of CVE-2021-40444
query: (((process.executable:/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND file.path:/.*\.[Cc][Aa][Bb]/ AND file.path:/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ii][Nn][Ee][Tt][Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee].*/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND file.path:/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ AND file.path:/.*\.[Ii][Nn][Ff].*/)) AND (NOT (file.path:/[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\.*/ AND file.path:/.*[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp].*/ AND file.path:/.*\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Ii][Nn][Ff]/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(((process.executable:*\\winword.exe AND file.path:*.cab AND file.path:*\\Windows\\INetCache*) OR (process.executable:*\\winword.exe AND file.path:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* AND file.path:*.inf*)) AND (NOT (file.path:C\:\\Users\\* AND file.path:*AppData\\Local\\Temp* AND file.path:*\\Content.inf)))`
